newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Piltel board elects new chairman.
newsitem.headline: Piltel board elects new chairman.

text.p: Cellular telephone operator Pilipino Telephone Corp said on Tuesday its board has elected former Trade and Industry Secretary Roberto Ongpin as its new chairman.

Piltel said in a statement Ongpin was elected chairman at a special meeting on Monday after the resignation of former Piltel chairman Victor Chiongbian. "Ongpin was elected chairman to serve the unexpired portion of Chiongbian's term," corporate secretary Michael Tantoco said.
Ongpin is a director of APC Group Inc, whose telecom unit Philippine Global Communications Inc recently bought more than 20 percent stake in Piltel. -- Manila newsroom (63 2) 841-8936, Fax 817-6267
